snippet.title: SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
"We could have stopped the storm, when we still had the chance."

Three years after the Purity Wars, Nortander is facing a new era. Two new factions, the Dark Elves and the Dwarves, are here to change the destiny of Eo, and it's up to you, a disgraced General, to take action. The stand-alone expansion SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest is OUT NOW on Steam, GOG and EA Origin.

Order here:
- Steam: http://n.thq.com/l0GK30oJNcq
- GOG: http://n.thq.com/g5rQ30oQ5K0

You already are a hero of Eo? Get a 40% price cut on Soul Harvest on Steam if you own SpellForce 3!
Your journey is about to begin? Get a 40% price cut on our bundle on Steam, including SpellForce 3 and SpellForce 3: Soul Harvest, for the complete experience!
